name: custom-crm
description: Custom CRM for sales pipeline tracking and communication aggregation

scripts.client: cd client && (command -v pnpm >/dev/null 2>&1 && pnpm dev || npm run dev)
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && (command -v pnpm >/dev/null 2>&1 && pnpm install || npm install)
scripts.build: npm install && cd client && npm install && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.postbuild: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const standalone=path.join(__dirname,'client','.next','standalone'); if(fs.existsSync(standalone)){console.log('Next.js standalone build ready');}else{console.log('Next.js build complete');}"
